content.description:
Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answers. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes. If the question prompts you to “Calculate,” you must show how you arrived at your final answer.

The data provided in the tables below are from the neighboring nations of Tobantson and Astimica.

Tobantson

Astimica

Year

<math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="$330" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>330</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="110" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>110</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="$225" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>225</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="10" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="75" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>75</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

(a) Calculate each of the following for Year <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Show your work.(i) Real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per capita for Tobantson(ii) Real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per capita for Astimica

(b) If Tobantson and Astimica have the same velocity of money in Year <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, which nation must have the higher money supply in Year <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ? Explain.

(c) Calculate each of the following in Year <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Show your work.(i) The inflation rate in Tobantson(ii) The inflation rate in Astimica

(d) Based on your answer to part (c), if the nominal interest rate is the same for both nations in Year <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, which nation experiences the higher real interest rate in Year <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ? Explain.

(e) As a result of the change in the <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> deflator from Year <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> to Year <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> in Astimica, what will happen to the demand for money and the nominal interest rate in Astimica? Explain.
content.question: Respond to all parts of the question.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
